mapper.select: SELECT O.o_id AS oId, O.m_id AS mId, O.pd_id AS pdId, O.o_date AS date, O.o_total AS total, O.o_cnt AS cnt, O.o_status AS status, O.o_memo AS memo, O.o_uuid AS uuid, O.o_name AS name, O.o_phone AS phone, O.o_zipcode AS zipcode, O.o_address AS address, O.o_addrDeatil addressDetail, P.pd_name AS pdName FROM ORDERS O JOIN PRODUCT P ON O.pd_id = P.pd_id WHERE O.m_id = #{mId};
